verses.verse: Now the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> that <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5288>young<s%> <S%H5288>man<s%> who was <S%H5375>carrying<s%> his <S%H3627>armor,<s%> <S%H1980>"Come<s%> and let us <S%H5674>cross<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> to the Philistines' <S%H4673>garrison<s%> that is on <S%H5676>yonder<s%> <S%H5676>side.<s%>" But he did not <S%H5046>tell<s%> his father.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was <S%H3427>staying<s%> in the <S%H7097>outskirts<s%> of <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H7416>pomegranate<s%> <S%H7416>tree<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in <S%H4051>Migron.<s%> And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> [were] with him [were] about <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%>

and <S%H281>Ahijah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H285>Ahitub,<s%> Ichabod's <S%H251>brother,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6372>Phinehas,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5941>Eli,<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> at <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> was <S%H5375>wearing<s%> an <S%H646>ephod.<s%> And the <S%H5971>people<s%> did not <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> had <S%H1980>gone.<s%>

And <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H9278>passes<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> to <S%H5674>cross<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> to the Philistines' <S%H4673>garrison,<s%> there was a <S%H8127>sharp<s%> <S%H5553>crag<s%> on the <S%H2088>one<s%> <S%H5676>side,<s%> and a <S%H8127>sharp<s%> <S%H5553>crag<s%> on the <S%H2088>other<s%> <S%H5676>side,<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H949>Bozez,<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H5573>Seneh.<s%>

The <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8127>crag<s%> <S%H4690>rose<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H4136>opposite<s%> <S%H4363>Michmash,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> on the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H4136>opposite<s%> <S%H1387>Geba.<s%>

Then <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5288>young<s%> <S%H5288>man<s%> who was <S%H5375>carrying<s%> his <S%H3627>armor,<s%> <S%H1980>"Come<s%> and let us <S%H5674>cross<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> to the <S%H4673>garrison<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised;<s%> <S%H194>perhaps<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H6213>work<s%> for us, for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is not <S%H4622>restrained<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> by <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> by <S%H4592>few.<s%>"

And his <S%H3627>armor<s%> <S%H5375>bearer<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H6213>"Do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that is in your <S%H3824>heart;<s%> <S%H5186>turn<s%> yourself, [and] <S%H2009>here<s%> I am with you according to your <S%H3824>desire.<s%>"
Then <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> we will <S%H5674>cross<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> to the <S%H376>men<s%> and <S%H1540>reveal<s%> ourselves to them.
<S%H518>"If<s%> they <S%H559>say<s%> to us, 'Wait <S%H5704>until<s%> we <S%H5060>come<s%> to you'; then we will <S%H5975>stand<s%> in our <S%H8478>place<s%> and not <S%H5927>go<s%> up to them.

"But <S%H518>if<s%> they <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H5927>'Come<s%> up to us,' then we will <S%H5927>go<s%> up, for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> them into our <S%H3027>hands;<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> shall be the <S%H226>sign<s%> to us."

And when <S%H8147>both<s%> of them <S%H1540>revealed<s%> themselves to the <S%H4673>garrison<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> are <S%H3318>coming<s%> out of the <S%H2356>holes<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> they have <S%H2244>hidden<s%> themselves."

So the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H4673>garrison<s%> <S%H6030>hailed<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> and his <S%H3627>armor<s%> <S%H5375>bearer<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5927>"Come<s%> up to us and we will <S%H3045>tell<s%> you <S%H1697>something.<s%>" And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H3627>armor<s%> <S%H5375>bearer,<s%> <S%H5927>"Come<s%> up <S%H310>after<s%> me, for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"

Then <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H5927>climbed<s%> up on his <S%H3027>hands<s%> and <S%H7272>feet,<s%> with his <S%H3627>armor<s%> <S%H5375>bearer<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> him; and they <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%> and his <S%H3627>armor<s%> <S%H5375>bearer<s%> <S%H4191>put<s%> some to <S%H4191>death<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him.

And that <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> and his <S%H3627>armor<s%> <S%H5375>bearer<s%> <S%H5221>made<s%> was about <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> within about <S%H2677>half<s%> a <S%H4618>furrow<s%> in an <S%H6776>acre<s%> of <S%H7704>land.<s%>

And there was a <S%H2731>trembling<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and among <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%> <S%H1571>Even<s%> the <S%H4673>garrison<s%> and the <S%H7843>raiders<s%> <S%H2729>trembled,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7264>quaked<s%> so that it <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H430>great<s%> <S%H2731>trembling.<s%>

Now Saul's <S%H6822>watchmen<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> <S%H4127>melted<s%> <S%H4127>away;<s%> and they <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H1988>here<s%> and [there.]

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> [were] with him, <S%H6485>"Number<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> has <S%H1980>gone<s%> from us." And when they had <S%H6485>numbered,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> and his <S%H3627>armor<s%> <S%H5375>bearer<s%> were not [there.]

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H281>Ahijah,<s%> <S%H5066>"Bring<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5066>here.<s%>" For the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> was at that <S%H3117>time<s%> with the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>happened<s%> <S%H5704>while<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1696>talked<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> that the <S%H1995>commotion<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H1980>continued<s%> and <S%H7227>increased;<s%> so <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H622>"Withdraw<s%> your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>"

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> [were] with him <S%H2199>rallied<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4421>battle;<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> man's <S%H2719>sword<s%> was against his <S%H7453>fellow,<s%> [and there was] <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4103>confusion.<s%>

Now the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> <S%H834>[who<s%>] were with the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H865>previously,<s%> <S%H8032><s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up with them <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> they <S%H1571>also<s%> [turned] to be with the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> who [were] with <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H3083>Jonathan.<s%>

When <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> who had <S%H2244>hidden<s%> themselves in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H5127>fled,<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> they <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1692>pursued<s%> them <S%H1692>closely<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle.<s%>
So the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3467>delivered<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that <S%H3117>day,<s%> and the <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H5674>spread<s%> <S%H5674>beyond<s%> Beth-aven.

Now the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were hard-pressed on that <S%H3117>day,<s%> for <S%H7586>Saul<s%> had <S%H422>put<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H422>under<s%> <S%H422>oath,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H779>"Cursed<s%> be the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H398>eats<s%> <S%H3899>food<s%> <S%H5704>before<s%> <S%H6153>evening,<s%> and <S%H5704>until<s%> I have <S%H5358>avenged<s%> myself on my <S%H340>enemies.<s%>" So <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H3605><s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2938>tasted<s%> <S%H3899>food.<s%>
And <S%H3605>all<s%> [the people of] the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> the <S%H9194>forest,<s%> and there was <S%H1706>honey<s%> on the <S%H6440>ground.<s%> <S%H7704><s%>

When the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> the <S%H9194>forest,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> [there was] a <S%H1982>flow<s%> of <S%H1706>honey;<s%> but <S%H369>no<s%> man <S%H5381>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> to his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> the <S%H7621>oath.<s%>

But <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> had not <S%H8085>heard<s%> when his father <S%H1>put<s%> the <S%H7650>people<s%> <S%H5971>under<s%> <S%H7650>oath;<s%> therefore, he <S%H7650>put<s%> out the <S%H7971>end<s%> of the <S%H7097>staff<s%> that [was] in his <S%H4294>hand<s%> and <S%H3027>dipped<s%> it in the <S%H2881>honeycomb,<s%> <S%H3295><s%> and <S%H1706>put<s%> his <S%H7725>hand<s%> to his <S%H3027>mouth,<s%> and his <S%H6310>eyes<s%> <S%H5869>brightened.<s%>

Then <S%H376>one<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Your father <S%H1>strictly<s%> <S%H7650>put<s%> the <S%H7650>people<s%> <S%H5971>under<s%> <S%H7650>oath,<s%> <S%H7650>saying,<s%> <S%H559>'Cursed<s%> be the <S%H779>man<s%> <S%H376>who<s%> <S%H834>eats<s%> <S%H398>food<s%> <S%H3899>today.<s%>'" And the <S%H3117>people<s%> were <S%H5971>weary.<s%>

Then <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "My father has <S%H1>troubled<s%> the <S%H5916>land.<s%> <S%H776>See<s%> <S%H7200>now,<s%> <S%H4994>how<s%> my <S%H3588>eyes<s%> have <S%H5869>brightened<s%> <S%H215>because<s%> I <S%H3588>tasted<s%> a <S%H2938>little<s%> of <S%H4592>this<s%> <S%H2088>honey.<s%>

<S%H637>"How<s%> <S%H637>much<s%> <S%H3588><s%> <S%H637>more,<s%> <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3863>if<s%> only the <S%H5971>people<s%> had <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H398>freely<s%> <S%H3117>today<s%> of the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of their <S%H340>enemies<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H4672>found!<s%> For <S%H6258>now<s%> the <S%H4347>slaughter<s%> among the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> has not been <S%H7235>great.<s%>"

And they <S%H5221>struck<s%> among the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H4363>Michmash<s%> to <S%H357>Aijalon.<s%> And the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H5888>weary.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5860>rushed<s%> <S%H6213>greedily<s%> upon the <S%H7998>spoil,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H1241>oxen<s%> and <S%H1121>calves,<s%> <S%H1241><s%> and <S%H7819>slew<s%> [them] on the <S%H776>ground;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H398>ate<s%> [them] with the <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

Then they <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H2398>sinning<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> by <S%H398>eating<s%> with the <S%H1818>blood.<s%>" And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "You have <S%H898>acted<s%> <S%H898>treacherously;<s%> <S%H1556>roll<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> to me <S%H3117>today.<s%>"

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6327>"Disperse<s%> <S%H6327>yourselves<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H376>'Each<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> of you <S%H5066>bring<s%> me his <S%H7794>ox<s%> or his <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> and <S%H7819>slaughter<s%> [it] <S%H2088>here<s%> and <S%H398>eat;<s%> and do not <S%H2398>sin<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> by <S%H398>eating<s%> with the <S%H1818>blood.<s%>'" So <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H5066>brought<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> his <S%H7794>ox<s%> with him, and <S%H7819>slaughtered<s%> [it] <S%H8033>there.<s%>
And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> it was the <S%H2490>first<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> that he <S%H1129>built<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let us <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%> and <S%H962>take<s%> <S%H962>spoil<s%> among them <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H216>light,<s%> and let us not <S%H7604>leave<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of them." And they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6213>"Do<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> seems <S%H2896>good<s%> to you." So the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let us <S%H7126>draw<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1988>here.<s%>"

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> "Shall I <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>? Wilt Thou <S%H5414>give<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>?" But He did not <S%H6030>answer<s%> him on that <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5066>"Draw<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H1988>here,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> you <S%H6438>chiefs<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H3045>investigate<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4100>how<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H9128>sin<s%> has <S%H1961>happened<s%> <S%H3117>today.<s%>

"For as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> who <S%H3467>delivers<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> <S%H518><s%> it is in <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> he shall <S%H3588>surely<s%> <S%H4191><s%> <S%H4191>die.<s%>" But not <S%H369>one<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> him.

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> "You shall be on <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5676>side<s%> and I and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> will be on the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H5676>side.<s%>" And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H6213>"Do<s%> <S%H2896>what<s%> seems <S%H2896>good<s%> to you."

Therefore, <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3051>"Give<s%> a <S%H8549>perfect<s%> [lot.]" And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> were <S%H3920>taken,<s%> but the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3318>escaped.<s%>
